entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Amazon Linux Runtime IDs native dependencies #62694
  • Issues with the Crc32 intrinsic in the Jit #62692
    7.0.0
  • Skip unnecessary RegexNode reductions in NonBacktracking mode #62681
    7.0.0

Closed

  • StressLogAnalyzer is failing to build #62664
  • Blazor WASM debugging stops working with VS 2022 RC. Server side still works. #61531
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #61050
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove small casts on the RHS of `ASG(CLS_VAR)` #62693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix duplicated FldSeq in block morphing #62687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not contain zeroes for `STOREIND(CLS_VAR_ADDR)` #62686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Unify the namespaces of HashProviderDispenser #62590
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Cleanup, use camel case name conventions of method parameters #62633
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Workaround clang crash due to large array assignment #62675
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix gcc warnings in mono #62684
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix errors in Clang 13 #62685
    community-contribution
  • Replace CorInfoIntrinsics with NamedIntrinsic #62639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move a few vendor libraries to src/native/external #62673
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Two small fixes for the recently merged in merged wrapper logic #62683
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1509406 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adds BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62679
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62428
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Build NativeAOT flavor of clrcompression static lib #62570
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
